scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Core_IGUserMedia_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Core_IGHashTagSearch_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" /> <property id="pageId" resourceName="CF_FbPageId" dataType="string" defaultValue="" /> <property id="accessToken" resourceName="CF_FbGraphAccessToken" dataType="string" defaultValue="" /> <property id="limit" resourceName="CF_Limit" dataType="int" defaultValue="6"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" minValue="1" maxValue="50" /> </property> <property id="columns" resourceName="CF_Columns" dataType="int" defaultValue="3"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" minValue="2" maxValue="6" /> </property> </propertyGroup>
